data.eml:eml: The cicada genus Karenia Distant, 1888 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae), with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pham, Hong-Thai, Constant, Jerome (2014): The cicada genus Karenia Distant, 1888 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 3852 (5): 579-584, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3852.5.6
